Title: An expert system of measurement of individual knowledge for teeth treatment
Source title: International Journal of Software Engineering and its Applications
Affiliations: School of Computer Science, Bina Nusantara University, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Silitonga, D.V., School of Computer Science, Bina Nusantara University, Indonesia; Budiharto, W., School of Computer Science, Bina Nusantara University, Indonesia
Abstract: Knowing how to take a good care of teeth is very important to be known by every people to have the healthy and strong teeth. Taking care in the wrong way will make teeth broken and cause many teeth problem. Expert system is a system which is built to solve problem for user in certain field. This research aims to design an expert system-based application to assist someone to know their level of knowledge in taking care of teeth. Through this application, user could know how to take care of teeth so then they could minimize the teeth problem. © 2015 SERSC.
Author Keywords: ECLIPSE; Expert system; Measurement; Teeth treatment
References: Turban, E., Decision Support and Expert Systems: Management Support Systems (1995), (4th Edition). Englewood Cliffs, New Jersey: Pretince Hall; Giarratano, J., Riley, G., Expert Systems: Principles and Programming (2005), (4th Edition), Thompson Course Technology; Pressman, R.S., Software Engineering: A Practitioners Approach (2010), (7th Edition), McGraw Hill; Sha, A., Saudi, H.I., An Expert System for Diagnosis and Management of Oral Ulcers (2014) Tanta Dental Journal, 11 (1), pp. 42-46; Sorana-Maria, B., Manuela, C., Adrian, G., Mariana, P., Expert System for Determining the Level of Stress before Pediatric Dental Treatment (2014) Procedia Technology, 12, pp. 548-557; Abey, L., An Expert System for Oral Diagnosis (1987) Journal of Dental Education, 51 (8), pp. 475-480; http://www.dentalhealth.org/tell-me-about/topic/caring-for-teeth/caring-for-my-teeth; http://www.simplestepsdental.com/SS/ihtSS/r.==/st.31845/t.452802/pr.3.html; Bahaa, K., Noor, G., Yousif, Y., The Artificial Intelligence Approach for Diagnosis, Treatment and Modelling in Orthodontic (2011), Principles in Contemporary Orthodontics, IntechOpen
